name: create_character
description: A function which generates a character based on the user's preferences. Returns the character's ID, which the user can then use to locate their character.

name.description: The character's name. If no name has been decided, input an empty string.

level.description: An integer value between 1 and 20 (inclusive) representing the character's level. If no level has been decided, default to 1.

race.description: The character's race. Do not confuse this with subrace.

subrace.description: The character's subrace. Not to be confused with their race.

str-score.description: The character's base Strength score, before any racial bonuses are applied.

dex-score.description: The character's base Dexterity score, before any racial bonuses are applied.

con-score.description: The character's base Constitution score, before any racial bonuses are applied.

int-score.description: The character's base Intelligence score, before any racial bonuses are applied.

wis-score.description: The character's base Wisdom score, before any racial bonuses are applied.

cha-score.description: The character's base Charisma score, before any racial bonuses are applied.

saving-throw-proficiencies.description: The types of saving throws the character would have proficiency, depending on their class; consult the System Reference Document.

skill-proficiencies.description: The types of skills that the character is proficient in, depending on their race and class choices.
